tool_description: Monitors ongoing vendor compliance with regulatory requirements, contract terms, certifications, and alerts for renewals or compliance issues.
error_messages: Vendor not found: Provided vendor_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid compliance category: Use valid compliance categories from the supported list.
Compliance data unavailable: Unable to retrieve compliance information for specified categories.
Monitoring setup failed: Unable to establish compliance monitoring for the vendor.
usage: Provide vendor_id and compliance_categories array to monitor. The tool checks current compliance status and identifies any issues or upcoming renewals.

category_results.description: Compliance status for each monitored category

renewal_dates.description: Upcoming renewal dates for certifications or documents
